Description of incident: The Mandarin Oriental Hotel Group has informed customers of a breach when malware was found on their credit card transaction systems, at the following locations:Boston                                   GenevaHong Kong                              Hyde Park, LondonLas Vegas                                MiamiNew York                                  San FranciscoWashington DC                         The Landmark Mandarin Oriental, Hong KongThe information compromised included names and credit card numbers.More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-56994
